title: Getting RADS error again...
body:
It's been forever since I got this and I did the same thing I did to remove it last time but It doesn't seem to be working this time.

EDIT: strangely enough Undoing the fix that worked for me last time (https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5efdy9/fix_for_rads_error_patch_623/)

and doing this 
1. Right click on your connection icon in the bottom right of your screen.
2. Go to the network centre. 
3. Go to the adapter settings thingie.
4. Search your connection.
5. Right click -> properties.
6. Search Internet protocol version 4.
7. Right click -> properties.
8. Change your DNS servers to 8.8.4.4 (the first one) and 8.8.8.8 (the second one).

This worked for me and also fixed a problem that I sometimes had which said that I couldn't connect to a site because my "DNS-Lookup failed".

Has fixed it for me :)

replies.body: Typically those RADS errors can be fixed by updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but hey whatever works right? Adjusting your DNS like this is a good way of getting a better connection, but I'm glad it was able to help you issue!
